contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 27, 1993 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (1st Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-1st-section
Test Piece Contest
Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer]
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - soprano - Cwmaman. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40 7 bands competed.
March 3, 2011, 1:38 p.m. July 2, 2020, 9:51 p.m.
1 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Nigel Seaman
2 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Bernard Williams
3 Abergavenny Borough Band Eric Powell
4 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
5 Lewis Merthyr Band Lyndon Baglin
6 Ebbw Vale Band Michael Jones
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Alan Bourne
Withdrawn Markham and District Band Unknown
